name: The Mystic Vale 0.1 (Alpha)
description:
This game is about a demon who get's amnesia. Every time he dies, he is reborn back at the previous checkpoint with no recollection of anything that happened since. He must journey across the world to regain his memories. Kill people, read swear words, look at the beautiful blood*, die repeatedly, and make your own moral code.

*This is a text based game, there is no visible blood except for the word blood...

Early version of a Text Based Adventure game

Caution:

Contains Adult Language, Graphic Imagery, and All Around Badassery

This is my very first experience with Game design, I really hope you like it.  I will continue updating until it is finished. Right now, it is mostly playable. Only goes up until the first checkpoint.
